name: places/ChIJE-9Yr5VZwokREuoXV_QViTI
formattedAddress: 247 W 11th St, New York, NY 10014, USA
adrFormatAddress: 247 W 11th St, New York, NY 10014, USA

originalText.text: I have worked with Dr Brooke for several years now. I am always amazed at everything she knows and how right on she is with a diagnosis when I ask her about a symptom I am experiencing. I have Hashimoto and my quality of life has improved greatly since working with her! I am almost to my old self again! I really enjoy reading her blog posts and monthly emails, I always relate so much to them and end up sending them on to family and friends who also enjoy reading them! Dr Brooke is very kind and genuine and truly cares about her patients.

originalText.text: I began listening to Dr. Brooke’s podcast five years ago. I have learned so much about health and wellness from there alone. However, after years of trying to resolve my health issues with conventional medicine and still feeling miserable in my skin, I decided to schedule an appointment with her. I can honestly say it is the best investment I have made on myself.  She is a wealth of information as well as caring and truly interested in her patients well being. After testing I began to implement her recommendations and one month later was seeing and feeling the results I had hoped for. There is still work to be done but I am well on my way to regaining my health.

originalText.text: Dr. Brooke is a wealth of information, but she is able to convey this in such a way that you don't need to have a medical degree to understand it.  She is vulnerable and relatable and I really appreciate that about her.  The insights and information she sends out in her emails and blog posts have been life changing for me-Dr. Brooke is my go to resource for anything and everything  to do with female hormones and how to be my absolute best self!!!

originalText.text: I began listening to Dr. Brooke's podcast in 2017. I immediately knew there was something wrong, but was not ready to make the financial investment. After 2 years of seeing very little results in spite of diet and exercise changes I finally decided to begin working with Dr. Brooke in September 2019. I cannot express how grateful I am to have found Dr. Brooke, she was able to diagnose a host of issues that regular medicine doctors had missed for years. I am glad I made the investment on my health.

text.text: I began listening to Dr. Brooke's podcast in 2017. I immediately knew there was something wrong, but was not ready to make the financial investment. After 2 years of seeing very little results in spite of diet and exercise changes I finally decided to begin working with Dr. Brooke in September 2019. I cannot express how grateful I am to have found Dr. Brooke, she was able to diagnose a host of issues that regular medicine doctors had missed for years. I am glad I made the investment on my health.

originalText.text: Dr. Brooke is great to work with. She teaches you the science behind what your body is doing so that you are a partner in your healthcare. She is a good listener and she helps you find the core issues instead of taking a band-aid approach to masking symptoms. I’ve had improvements related to histamine intolerance, PCOS, and Hashimoto’s. My overall energy has increased and I have less depression and anxiety. All of these will be lifelong issues I’ll have to deal with, but the steps I’ve taken with Dr. Brooke's guidance will help me manage them, plus I know where to turn when I eventually deal with menopause.
